section.heading: Collecting trust property.
section.text: A trustee shall take reasonable steps to compel a former trustee or other person to deliver trust property to the trustee, and to redress a breach of trust known to the trustee to have been committed by a former trustee.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 812 of the Uniform Trust Code.
